name: DBHcms
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: The DBHcms is a small free Open Source content management system for personal and small business websites.

matches.text: powered by DBHcms

matches.regexp:

\s]+Please leave this link on your website, it will help a lot for the DBHcms to get well-known. [

\s]+know about your website so I can add you to my references.[
\s]+Thank you very much for your cooperation! Greets, Kai.[
\s]+-->)

(?-mix:<!--[
\s]+Change the copyright but please leave a link "powered by DBHcms" to http://www.drbenhur.com[
